subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Two days after Isiah Thomas was rewarded with a contract extension, the Knicks were roundly thumped by the Raptors, who came from nowhere to become the class of the Atlantic Division.
snippet: Two days after Isiah Thomas was rewarded with a contract extension, the Knicks were roundly thumped by the Raptors, who came from nowhere to become the class of the Atlantic Division.
